attributes.comment:
It has not been long since fees for adoption related petitions were raised.
This was already burdensome for families faced with many expenses for their
international adoption, and now more fee increases are proposed.

I do not see why our government should discourage American families from
adopting children who will become educated, productive and loyal citizens of our
country. These children do not pose a security risk. Our govenment should be in
the business of encouraging adoption, both domestic and international.

I strongly request that adoption related petitions be exempted from the fee
increases.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Michael R. Myracle
